#   Background

*   Statisticians struggle with reading in large dataset (Matthews twitch)

*   `read.csv` is old

*   Old dogs need to learn new tricks

*   There are better and more efficient algorithms (see book)

    *   `rio::import`
    
    *   `readr::read_csv` (part of `tidyverse`)
    
    *   `data.table::fread`
